title: Clean But Please Let Me Go!
text: The hotel is old, but clean. The receptionist (if you could say so) is behind a bullet proof glass... that tells you something about the neighborhood. When I got out of the hotel two druggies started following me and tried to steal my luggage, finally I had to pay U$ 30!!The worst area for a tourist. Besides, I had the worst luck of all. I never got to see the muffins or donuts!
